title: LF D5+ TOP MAIN DIAMOND FOR OOL
body:
hi my team are looking for a a diamond 5 or above top main that can play champs that work as a team with the other members such as ekko,moakai,trundle

if u can play those and want to put ur main champs we would be happy to make a team comps around it

if u r interested in this message leave a comment or add me in game

thanks
